alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Elmore; Lowndes; Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:03PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Elmore, northwestern Bullock, northeastern Lowndes, southwestern Macon and Montgomery Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shorter to near Dannelly Field. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Prattville, Hayneville, Pike Road, Shorter, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Auburn University In Montgomery, Woodcrest, Emerald Mountain, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Pintlala, Hunter, Alabama State University, Hope Hull and Dannelly Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
